title: Part (a)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that the firm hires workers in a perfectly competitive labor market.
The response states that the firm hires workers in a perfectly competitive labor market.

title: Part (b)
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

The response to part (b)(ii) must both state that the wage rate the firm will pay will increase and explain why in order to receive the point.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include either of the criteria below.
The response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The response accurately includes both of the criteria below.

title: Part (c)
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

The response must both state that the firm will hire fewer workers and explain why in order to receive the point.
descriptions: The response does not state that the firm will hire fewer workers or does not explain that the price of the firm’s product will decrease, which will therefore reduce the derived demand for labor.
The response states that the firm will hire fewer workers and explains that the price of the firm’s product will decrease, which will therefore reduce the derived demand for labor.
